About

The Elk Grove Bike Park is a Cosumnes Community Services District (CSD) park located within Elk Grove Park in Elk Grove, California. The bike park is free and open every day from early morning until dusk. THE BIKE PARK WILL BE CLOSED IF IT'S MUDDY. Donations to the donation box near the bike park entrance are greatly appreciated!

Please join the bike park Facebook group and Instagram to find out the latest information about events and volunteer build daze. Volunteers can earn community service hours for school, scouts, court ordered, etc. by building/weeding during our build sessions.

Ride smart, ride safe

  • Protect yourself. testtestest ok

  • Bikes only! No scooters, hoverboards, skateboards, motorized vehicles, etc.
  • No RC cars- these damage the jumps
  • No climbing, running, sitting, standing on jumps
  • Don't cross in between or stand behind jumps. This is extremely dangerous, some riding can collide with you
